## Data

Using RStudio, we could easily open a dataset and take a look at it.

```{r}
data("iris")
```

And what else can we do?

```{r}
summary(iris)
```

```{r}
head(iris, n = 10)
```


## Add a table
```{r echo=FALSE}
kable(iris[1:5,], caption="Iris dataset")
```
